title: Vegetable Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the diced onion, bell pepper, and zucchini. Sauté until the vegetables are tender.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs together with salt and pepper.
Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet with the sautéed vegetables.
Gently scramble the eggs and mix them with the vegetables until cooked to your liking.
Add the spinach leaves and cook until wilted.
Remove from heat and serve hot.
